description: Police were alerted to a man walking along the dual carriageway in Irvine, North Ayrshire.
title: Man walking along A71 dies after being hit by car
title_page: Man walking along A71 dies after being hit by car - BBC News
maintext:
A 49-year-old man has died after he was hit by a car while walking along the A71 in Irvine, North Ayrshire.
Police were alerted to a man walking along the dual carriageway between the Greenwood Interchange and Corsehill Mount roundabout at about 18:45 on Wednesday.
However, the man was involved in a collision with a silver Audi A1 before police arrived. He was pronounced dead at the scene and his next of kin is aware.
The 36-year-old female driver of the car was uninjured. The road was closed for investigation and reopened at about 01:40 on Thursday.
